update ord_appointment
scheduling_id = #{schedulingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_detail_id = #{sourceDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=CHAR},
time_state = #{timeState,jdbcType=CHAR},
dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dep_name = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bin_id = #{binId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bin_name = #{binName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_no = #{appNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
app_way = #{appWay,jdbcType=CHAR},
app_status = #{appStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=CHAR},
pat_no = #{patNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_id = #{patId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pat_card_num = #{patCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_name = #{patName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_sex = #{patSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_identity_num = #{patIdentityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=CHAR},
card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sp_no = #{spNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sp_name = #{spName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visit_date = #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_code = #{takeCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
take_time = #{takeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visit_time = #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
doc_time = #{docTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
med_time = #{medTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sff_id = #{sffId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sff_name = #{sffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upload_sign = #{uploadSign,jdbcType=CHAR},
upload_date = #{uploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cancel_date = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cancel_sff_id = #{cancelSffId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
